name: A Zombie Dragon Rider in The City: FREE Flying & Shooting Multiplayer Games - By Dead Cool Apps
name_original: A Zombie Dragon Rider in The City: FREE Flying & Shooting Multiplayer Games - By Dead Cool Apps
description:
There's big trouble in the skies and it ain't pretty!

Rip through the air on your trusty Dragon and
rid the world of those pesky Zombie Dragon Riders!

FEATURES INCLUDE:

• Upgrade your dragon with coins
• Cool power ups to collect
• Awesome real time multiplayer
• Multiple Worlds to play in
• Easy to control

Download NOW 100% FREE.
